//test
#pragma config(I2C_Usage, I2C1, i2cSensors)
#pragma config(Sensor, I2C_1,  ,               sensorQuadEncoderOnI2CPort,    , AutoAssign )
#pragma config(Motor,  port1,           RDrive,        tmotorVex393HighSpeed_HBridge, openLoop, encoderPort, I2C_1)
#pragma config(Motor,  port10,          LDrive,        tmotorVex393HighSpeed_HBridge, openLoop)
//*!!Code automatically generated by 'ROBOTC' configuration wizard               !!*//

task main()
{

motor(LDrive) = 60;
motor(RDrive) = 80;
wait1Msec(1000);
//nMotorEncoder(LDrive) = 0;
motor(LDrive) = -80;
motor(RDrive) =80;
wait1Msec(1000); //Turn left for 1s
motor(LDrive) = 80;
motor(RDrive) = 80;
wait1Msec(5000); //Go forward 5s
motor(LDrive) = -80;
motor(RDrive) =80;
wait1Msec(1000); //Turn left for 1s
motor(LDrive) = 80;
motor(RDrive) = 80;
wait1Msec(5000); //Go forward 5s
motor(LDrive) = 80;
motor(RDrive) = 80;

}
